tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_tracking (
	raw_material_id INT,
	raw_material_name VARCHAR(50),
	raw_material_quantity INT,
	finished_goods_id INT,
	finished_goods_name VARCHAR(50),
	finished_goods_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity_change INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE InventoryLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    product_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    action TEXT
);
